example.parse: (TOP (S (S (CONJ وِ) (PP (PREP بِ) (NP (DET+ADJ التالِي))) (VP (IV3MS+IV يِزْداد) (NP-SBJ (NOUN عَدَد) (NP (DET+NOUN اليَهُود))))) (CONJ وِ) (S (NP-SBJ (DEM_PRON دِي)) (NP-PRD (NP (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG خِطَّة) (ADJ+NSUFF_FEM_SG يَهُودِيَّة)) (SBAR (WHNP-1 (-NONE- 0)) (S (VP (PRT (NEG_PART ما)) (IV3FS+IV تِخُرّ) (PRT (NEG_PART ش)) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-1)) (NP-OBJ (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG المَيَّة)))))))))
